title: Meridian.New.World.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Meridian.New.World.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Strategy / Indie
Developer : Elder Games
Publisher : Merge Games, Headup Games
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Eng
Crack : CODEX



System requirements:  
Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor : Dual core 3Ghz
Memory : 2 GB
Video : nVidia GeForce GTX 275 / ATI Radeon 4770 (or higher)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 1.2 GB


Game information:  

Meridian: New World - a real time strategy game focuses on the story.
Players will assume the role of Daniel Hanson, commander of the first
expedition to the planet Meridian and its discoverer. Isleduya everything
around you, they can take many difficult decisions in interesting conversations.

Meridian: New World will create its own army, in which every soldier will
be equipped so as you'd like. Use your ability, coupled with the Chief of
the equipment the soldiers on the way to victory, or sabotage the
production of the enemy.

Can be a really long time to understand the weapons to find the perfect
equipment. And it is possible instead to establish a strong economy,
and a huge army will depend on the resources. In the game you will be
able to use as many units as you need it.

Game Features:  

Traditional strategy with an emphasis on individual control of every detail.
Exploring the world can affect the continuation of the war.

15 different types of weapons to help create your own versatile unit suitable
for any operation or, for example, a narrow section in SWAT.

Get experience in battle, and when the level of the commander.

Communicate with people on the ship in order to make friends with a tight crew.

Create your own maps using the in-game editor.


RePack Features:  

Meridian: New World
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers)
